original: 真名疑為張晟，但正史上未有確證。應是黑山賊或黃巾餘黨將領，因常騎白馬，謂騎白馬者為張白騎。張白騎在弘農叛亂，馬騰遣龐德討伐，大破張白騎。
text: The real name is suspected to be Zhang Sheng, but there is no confirmation in official history. It should be a black mountain thief or a yellow turban general. Because he often rides a white horse, he is called Zhang Baiqi. Zhang Baiqi rebelled in Hongnong, and Ma Teng sent Pound to crusade, breaking Zhang Baiqi.
